mapper.select: select * from module_p m left join (select module_id p_id,name p_name from module_p) p on m.parent_id = p.p_id order by order_no
select * from module_p m left join (select module_id p_id,name p_name from module_p) p on m.parent_id = p.p_id where module_id = #{moduleId} order by order_no
mapper.update: update module_p set name=#{name}, ctype=#{ctype}, parent_id=#{parentModule.moduleId}, order_no=#{orderNo}, state=#{state}, remark=#{remark}, update_time=#{updateTime} where module_id = #{moduleId}
